subject: Tennis
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: Azarenka, a Belarussian, already has a new mentor after Sam Sumyk, with whom she won two Grand Slam singles titles, left to work with Eugenie Bouchard.
snippet: Azarenka, a Belarussian, already has a new mentor after Sam Sumyk, with whom she won two Grand Slam singles titles, left to work with Eugenie Bouchard.
